text: Henri Carel Willem "Hans" Schnitger (August 5, 1915 - March 2, 2013) was a Dutch field hockey player who competed in the 1936 Summer Olympics. Schnitger was a member of the Dutch field hockey team, which won the bronze medal. He played all five matches as forward. Schnitger was born in Enschede, where he lived until his death on March 2, 2013 from natural causes, aged 97.Oud- international Hans Schnitger overleden , hockey.nl, 2 March 2013 (in Dutch) ==References== ==Other websites== *profile *Hans Schnitger's obituary Category:1915 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Netherlands Category:Dutch field hockey players Category:People from Enschede Category:Sportspeople from Overijssel
title: Hans Schnitger
